name: Scribble Dungeon
description:
⚔️ ⚔️ ⚔️

Find the deepest treasure of the Scribble Dungeon!

Defeat enemies, level up, find treasures and earn experience to reach the deepest room of the dungeon!

Controls :

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Space to Attack nearby enemies

Enemy will perform an action only if you perform an action first.

Use this rule at your own advantage !

A game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #165

The theme was "One Action at a Time". 

Hope you like it! 

⚔️ ⚔️ ⚔️

More Informations :

- A game made with Unity

- Every sounds come from Envato : https://elements.envato.com/

- Graph made in Photoshop by me or took on Pixabay https://pixabay.com/

Time repartition :

- Code : 2h

- Graphs : 30 minutes

- Mood and Sounds : 30 minutes
